data.name: Jessica Jones
data.description: A resilient fighter who removes positive effects from enemies and clears negative effects from allies.

starItems.name: Jessica Jones
starItems.description: A resilient fighter who removes positive effects from enemies and clears negative effects from allies.

1.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>90%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>30%</color> chance to Bonus Attack for <color=#86e619>80%</color> damage.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage on primary and secondary attacks
Each attack has a <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy for self or a random ally

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>110%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>30%</color> chance to Bonus Attack for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage.

Each attack has a <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy for self or a random ally.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage on primary and secondary attack
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> chance to Bonus Attack

3.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>130%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to Bonus Attack for <color=#86e619>120%</color> damage.

Each attack has a <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy for self or a random ally.
3.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage on primary and secondary attack

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to Bonus Attack for <color=#86e619>140%</color> damage.

Each attack has a <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy for self or a random ally.
4.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage on primary and secondary attack

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>170%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to Bonus Attack for <color=#86e619>160%</color> damage.

Each attack has a <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy for self or a random ally.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage on primary attack
Chance to Bonus Attack <color=#86e619>1</color>-<color=#86e619>2</color> times

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to Bonus Attack <color=#86e619>1</color>-<color=#86e619>2</color> times for <color=#86e619>160%</color> damage.

Each attack has a <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy for self or a random ally.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage on primary attack
+<color=#86e619>10%</color> damage on secondary attacks
Generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy for a random <color=#fff568>DEFENDER</color> or <color=#fff568>A-FORCE</color> ally or self that was not at full energy

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>220%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to Bonus Attack <color=#86e619>1</color>-<color=#86e619>2</color> times for <color=#86e619>170%</color> damage.

Generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy for a random <color=#fff568>DEFENDER</color> or <color=#fff568>A-FORCE</color> ally or self that was not at full energy. Each attack has a <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy for self or a random ally.

1.description:
Clear <color=#86e619>1</color> negative effect from self and all allies.

Generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy for a random ally.
1.nextUpgrade:
Generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy for each <color=#fff568>DEFENDER</color> or <color=#fff568>A-FORCE</color> ally
Generate <color=#86e619>2</color> Ability Energy for random allies

2.description:
Clear <color=#86e619>1</color> negative effect from self and all allies.

Generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy for each <color=#fff568>DEFENDER</color> or <color=#fff568>A-FORCE</color> ally. Generate <color=#86e619>2</color> Ability Energy for random allies.
2.nextUpgrade: Clear <color=#86e619>2</color> negative effects from self and all allies

3.description:
Clear <color=#86e619>2</color> negative effects from self and all allies.

Generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy for each <color=#fff568>DEFENDER</color> or <color=#fff568>A-FORCE</color> ally. Generate <color=#86e619>2</color> Ability Energy for random allies.
3.nextUpgrade: Generate <color=#86e619>3</color> Ability Energy for random allies

4.description:
Clear <color=#86e619>2</color> negative effects from self and all allies.

Generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy for each <color=#fff568>DEFENDER</color> or <color=#fff568>A-FORCE</color> ally. Generate <color=#86e619>3</color> Ability Energy for random allies.
4.nextUpgrade:
Clear all negative effects from self
Clear <color=#86e619>3</color> negative effects all allies
Barrier self and all <color=#fff568>A-FORCE</color> allies for <color=#86e619>20%</color> of this character's Max Health

5.description:
Clear all negative effects from self. Clear <color=#86e619>3</color> negative effects from all allies.

Generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy for each <color=#fff568>DEFENDER</color> or <color=#fff568>A-FORCE</color> ally. Generate <color=#86e619>3</color> Ability Energy for random allies.

Barrier self and all <color=#fff568>A-FORCE</color> allies for <color=#86e619>20%</color> of this character's Max Health.
5.nextUpgrade:
Generate <color=#86e619>4</color> Ability Energy for random allies
Barrier all other allies for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health

6.description:
Clear all negative effects from self. Clear <color=#86e619>3</color> negative effects from all allies.

Generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy for each <color=#fff568>DEFENDER</color> or <color=#fff568>A-FORCE</color> ally. Generate <color=#86e619>4</color> Ability Energy for random allies.

Barrier self and all <color=#fff568>A-FORCE</color> allies for <color=#86e619>20%</color> of this character's Max Health. Barrier all other allies for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.
6.nextUpgrade:
Clear all negative effects from all allies
Apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>, up to a max of <color=#86e619>3</color> turns, to self and all <color=#fff568>A-FORCE</color> allies
Apply <color=#fff568>Immunity</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>A-FORCE</color> allies

7.description:
Clear all negative effects from self and all allies.

Generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy for each <color=#fff568>DEFENDER</color> or <color=#fff568>A-FORCE</color> ally. Generate <color=#86e619>4</color> Ability Energy for random allies.

Barrier self and all <color=#fff568>A-FORCE</color> allies for <color=#86e619>20%</color> of this character's Max Health. Barrier all other allies for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.

Apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>, up to a max of <color=#86e619>3</color> turns, to self and all <color=#fff568>A-FORCE</color> allies.
Apply <color=#fff568>Immunity</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>A-FORCE</color> allies.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>120%</color> damage + clear <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect.

Gain +<color=#86e619>100,000%</color> Extra Focus for this attack.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary target
<color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to call an assist from the <color=#fff568>A-FORCE</color> ally with the most Damage

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>170%</color> damage + clear <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect.

<color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to call an assist from the <color=#fff568>A-FORCE</color> ally with the most Damage.

Gain +<color=#86e619>100,000%</color> Extra Focus for this attack.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary target
Clear <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects from primary and secondary targets

3.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>210%</color> damage + clear <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects.

<color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to call an assist from the <color=#fff568>A-FORCE</color> ally with the most Damage.

Gain +<color=#86e619>100,000%</color> Extra Focus for this attack.

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>260%</color> damage + clear <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects.

<color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to call an assist from the <color=#fff568>A-FORCE</color> ally with the most Damage.

Gain +<color=#86e619>100,000%</color> Extra Focus for this attack.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary target
Clear <color=#86e619>3</color> positive effects from primary target
Generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy for this character

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>300%</color> damage + clear <color=#86e619>3</color> positive effects.

Generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy for this character.

<color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to call an assist from the <color=#fff568>A-FORCE</color> ally with the most Damage.

Gain +<color=#86e619>100,000%</color> Extra Focus for this attack.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary target
Attack adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>350%</color> damage
Clear all positive effects from primary and secondary targets
Always call an assist from the <color=#fff568>A-FORCE</color> ally with the most Damage

6.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>350%</color> damage + clear all positive effects.

Generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy for this character.

Call an assist from the <color=#fff568>A-FORCE</color> ally with the most Damage.

Gain +<color=#86e619>100,000%</color> Extra Focus for this attack.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary and adjacent targets
Apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>, up to a max of <color=#86e619>3</color> turns, to self and all <color=#fff568>A-FORCE</color> allies

7.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>400%</color> damage + clear all positive effects.

Apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>, up to a max of <color=#86e619>3</color> turns, to self and all <color=#fff568>A-FORCE</color> allies.

Call an assist from the <color=#fff568>A-FORCE</color> ally with the most Damage.

Generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy for this character.

Gain +<color=#86e619>100,000%</color> Extra Focus for this attack.

1.description:
Gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Resistance. <color=#fff568>DEFENDER</color> and <color=#fff568>A-FORCE</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Resistance.
Additional <color=#fff568>CITY</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Resistance.

On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>:
 > On Spawn, fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>5%</color> + <color=#86e619>5%</color> Speed Bar per <color=#fff568>A-FORCE</color> ally.
 > When this character or any <color=#fff568>A-FORCE</color> ally with <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health, clear <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> from that ally or self.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>5%</color> Resistance for additional <color=#fff568>CITY</color> allies
Other additional allies gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Resistance

2.description:
Gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Resistance. <color=#fff568>DEFENDER</color> and <color=#fff568>A-FORCE</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Resistance.
Additional <color=#fff568>CITY</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Resistance.
Other additional allies gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Resistance.

On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>:
 > On Spawn, fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>5%</color> + <color=#86e619>5%</color> Speed Bar per <color=#fff568>A-FORCE</color> ally.
 > When this character or any <color=#fff568>A-FORCE</color> ally, with <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health, clear <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> from that ally or self.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>10%</color> Max Health for self and <color=#fff568>A-FORCE</color> allies
+<color=#86e619>10%</color> Resistance for self, <color=#fff568>DEFENDER</color>, and <color=#fff568>A-FORCE</color> allies

3.description:
Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Max Health. <color=#fff568>A-FORCE</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Max Health.
Gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Resistance. <color=#fff568>DEFENDER</color> and <color=#fff568>A-FORCE</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Resistance.
Additional <color=#fff568>CITY</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Resistance.
Other additional allies gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Resistance.

On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>:
 > On Spawn, fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>5%</color> + <color=#86e619>5%</color> Speed Bar per <color=#fff568>A-FORCE</color> ally.
 > When this character or any <color=#fff568>A-FORCE</color> ally, with <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health, clear <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> from that ally or self.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>5%</color> Resistance for additional <color=#fff568>CITY</color> allies
+<color=#86e619>5%</color> Resistance for other additional allies
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> Armor for self and <color=#fff568>A-FORCE</color> allies

4.description:
Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Max Health. <color=#fff568>A-FORCE</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Max Health.
Gain +<color=#86e619>40%</color> Armor. <color=#fff568>A-FORCE</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>40%</color> Armor.
Gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Resistance. <color=#fff568>DEFENDER</color> and <color=#fff568>A-FORCE</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Resistance.
Additional <color=#fff568>CITY</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Resistance.
Other additional allies gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Resistance.

On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>:
 > On Spawn, fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>5%</color> + <color=#86e619>5%</color> Speed Bar per <color=#fff568>A-FORCE</color> ally.
 > When this character or any <color=#fff568>A-FORCE</color> ally, with <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health, clear <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> from that ally or self.
4.nextUpgrade: On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>, on Turn, heal self and all <color=#fff568>SECRET DEFENDER</color> and <color=#fff568>A-FORCE</color> allies for <color=#86e619>5%</color> of this character's Max Health and apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>, up to a max of <color=#86e619>3</color> turns

5.description:
Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Max Health. <color=#fff568>A-FORCE</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Max Health.
Gain +<color=#86e619>40%</color> Armor. <color=#fff568>A-FORCE</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>40%</color> Armor.
Gain +<color=#86e619>40%</color> Resistance. <color=#fff568>DEFENDER</color> and <color=#fff568>A-FORCE</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>40%</color> Resistance.
Additional <color=#fff568>CITY</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Resistance.
Other additional allies gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Resistance.

On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>:
 > On Spawn, fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>5%</color> + <color=#86e619>5%</color> Speed Bar per <color=#fff568>A-FORCE</color> ally.
 > When this character or any <color=#fff568>A-FORCE</color> ally, with <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health, clear <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> from that ally or self.
 > On Turn, heal self and all <color=#fff568>SECRET DEFENDER</color> and <color=#fff568>A-FORCE</color> allies for <color=#86e619>5%</color> of this character's Max Health and apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>, up to a max of <color=#86e619>3</color> turns.
